mapper.select: SELECT B.BLOG_ID AS BLOG_ID, B.BLOG_TITLE AS BLOG_TITLE, B.BLOG_THUMBNAIL_UUID AS BLOG_THUMBNAIL_UUID, B.READ_CNT AS READ_CNT, B.CREATE_DT AS CREATE_DT, M.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID FROM BLOG B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY B.CREATE_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLOG ( MEMBER_ID, BLOG_ORIGINAL_THUMBNAIL_NAME, BLOG_THUMBNAIL_UUID, BLOG_TITLE, BLOG_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{blogOriginalThumbnailName}, #{blogThumbnailUUID}, #{blogTitle}, #{blogContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT B.BLOG_ID AS BLOG_ID, B.BLOG_TITLE AS BLOG_TITLE, B.BLOG_CONTENT AS BLOG_CONTENT, B.READ_CNT AS READ_CNT, B.CREATE_DT AS CREATE_DT, B.UPDATE_DT AS UPDATE_DT, B.LIKE_COUNT AS LIKE_COUNT, B.BLOG_THUMBNAIL_UUID AS BLOG_THUMBNAIL_UUID, M.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID FROM BLOG B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE BLOG_ID = #{blogId}
